resources.string:
Beer Or No Beer is a simple drinking game including over 500 beer brands from all over the world and the same amount of fake brands. The game is played by passing the phone around and each person has to decide whether the displayed beer brand exists or not.
If somebody pushes the wrong button, he has to drink as much as it says. If somebody pushes the right button the next person pushing the wrong button will have to drink even more! 

Drink Responsibly! ;)
Beer Or No Beer is a freetime project by Alexander Schmidt
Click on the Text to see more information \n about the displayed beer brand!
Your brands will be displayed on the BeerOrNoBeer Facebook Fanpage so I can tell you when the brands have been addet to the list.
Be creative! Fake brands are very appreciated!
If you enjoy using Beer Or No Beer, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!
Join the official Beer or no Beer Facebook Fanpage to send new beerbrands and share your thoughts!
Join the official Beer or no Beer Fanpage!
